name: SpigotMC
description: The PurperMC server software for Minecraft: Java Edition.

installScript.script: mkdir -p /mnt/server && cd /mnt/server && curl -Lo BuildTools.jar https://hub.spigotmc.org/jenkins/job/BuildTools/lastSuccessfulBuild/artifact/target/BuildTools.jar && java -jar BuildTools.jar --rev latest && mv spigot-*.jar server.jar && echo
